ValidationRule.description:
Before the Current Step can be changed to Sent to New Case the following fields need to be completed:
AOR effective Date SOX Status Date Received
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c, "Sent to New Case")&& If((ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, "AOR") ||ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, "AOR and New Case")), ( (Ready_to_Send_to_New_Case__c > 0) || ISNULL(Date_Received__c) ), ISNULL(Date_Received__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before the Current Step can be Sent to New case, you must have a value in the following fields: AOR effective Date SOX Status Date Received
